content.detailedDescription:
It was the color of the starless night sky.  too many commercial lights to see stars.  i don't know if there were clouds in the sky.
i stepped from my car and looked directly overhead at the slowly drifting object...An object whose form i could only seduce from the outline of non blinking white lights.  it seemed huge and to cover a large section of sky9football field size or larger if altidude was as i thought it to be.  the lights were what you would expect to see of a house hold bulb at a 500 foot distance.
no one else seemed to see it.  i got back into my car and continued home.  i can't account for my calm behavior and do not believe i experienced any 'lost time'.  whatever it ras it was huge and moved silently. i don't recall seeing the overall extent of its size.
i now keep my eyes more on the night sky but have never seen any unusual site since.
chris cooper
content.summary: Directly above car while stopped along with many other vehicles at a stop light.  observed lights outling something huge (football field?) in angular edges (not curved).  it moved at a steady height at perhaps five miles per hour.  it was black.

content.detailedDescription: Was with family members have a late supper at torre a mare situated about 15km south from bari the main city beside the adriatic sea.  went out to have a cigarette and while observing the sea late at night looked up as usual to see the stars. one bright star that caught my attention was observed east far out above the sea and seemed to move slowly from the south. moving to a spot where there was a flagpole to better orient the light, it was moving slowly and after about 2 minutes or so it dimmed to about 1/8 the brightness.  looking to see if there was any flashing red/green airplane lights nor any noise there was none observed. after about 30 secs the object now being a dull red/amber color started to move a little faster in the northern direction it shot of north at an incrediable speed leaving a red trail that disapaded quickly.  i was disappointed that i was alone at the time of the sighting however was glad that i had another opportunity to witness my second concrete sighting in 10 years
content.summary: Bright light changed brightness before shooting off north

content.detailedDescription: At 10:00 i walked outside and saw a very bright light. i watched it for 10 min and it did not move. when i was about to go inside the light started to deam and took off to the west. i run and grab my husband so he could see it. when i came back outside the light was back in the same place and very bright again. but this time there was something smaller coming from the ground up to the ufo. as the smaller one got close both of them lost there light but you could still see them. they both took off, only the smaller one went north and the bigger one went back west and did this 5 or 6 times. when i saw the big one again it looked as if it turned really fast and was heading north. right at that time all the lights went out and you could not see it anymore. i wish everyone could have seen this. it was amazing.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was bright and moved like it was stocking something. the smaller one was fallowing it.

content.detailedDescription: Taking a troop of boy scouts for a campout in woods on farm land. group was out together playing game when suddenly in place of darkness the entire area was entirely lit as if it was daytime! it lasted only a few seconds but all were dumbfounded. since we were in an area without lights there was no explanation for the sudden light. to this day we have wondered what that was.
content.summary: Scouting campout

content.detailedDescription: I was working at 10:p.M. and i was outside when i notice an object coming from north east over me in a straight path towards the west. at first when i saw it the object had circular colored lights under the square frame that were spinning. as it flew over me i saw that it was square and i could only see the four white lights. as it was approaching me i got a very uneasy feeling. i turned my back to it as i walked slowly and stood in a shadowed area where i was.I felt liked i was being watched,and felt my life was being threatened. i then watched it as it flew over rayley's feild, in w. sacramento, ca. and then it went behind some clouds and i did not see it again. i had seen circular and triangle ufo's before, but never a square. i notice around five minutes later a helicopter and two planes were following the same path as the ufo did.
content.summary: Square object with four conered white lights

content.detailedDescription: So we were on a house boat on lake shasta up the squaw creek arm ,3 couples sitting out talking and whatching the stars when  i noticed a bright light,it looked like a helicopter hovering across the river up on the hill,i pointed it out and we thought they were doing night rescue then it seemed to move toward us and the light was slightly pulsing and when we all seemed to focus on it it shot to the left about 1 to 2 miles and stopped then it shot back to the right at 45 degree angle up about 1 mile then stopped again and then took off on the same angle out to space and left a trail about 300 yards long.We all turned to each other and agreed it was a ufo since no plane or helicopter can move that fast stopp and change direction like it did,this xmas we some some of the people again and we talked about it again and i then saw a show about mufon and thought i would report it even though it has been 10 years we all remember it like yesterday
content.summary: Six people on a house boat,spotted hovering light thought it was helicopter but it then shot to the left approx 1 to 2 miles and stopped then took off up 45 degrees the other way and stopped then shot off to space on the same angle leaving a trail

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in friends backyard. sraight ahead of me in the sky i could see orange balls of light throught the trees across the street. they were moving northeast and upward. one of the light balls came above the tree line and then stopped. i told my friends and we they all got up to look. after about 3 min. it just disappeared. we resumed our conversation and about 10 min later, i noticed the same thing. this time going  in the same direction, but we could see more. i realized sooner what was happening and told everyone that it was there again. we could see about 3-4 balls ascending behind the trees and this time two rose above the tree line and then stopped. again they hovered about 3 min and then disappeared. everyone was surpised and excited to have seen this. i even took a picture of it on my iphone. you can see it if you look at it in a dark room
content.summary: 2 sightings, 10 min apart, almost same config of orange orbs traversing the sky and stopping then later disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was awake last night becuase i could not sleep.  i could not get to sleep so i was on my cell phone looking up random things and my email around 3am or so. at apprx. 3:30am i began to hear a noise and it became very loud,  at first i thought it was a plane, but nothing like i've heard before.  it seemed to be hovering above my house for some time but i could not see anything in the sky.  the sky seemed to have a slight glow and was a little cloudy.  i have been around aircraft my whole life and i can recognize almost anything but i have never heard a craft sound like that.  it also did not have a doppler effect,  the noise when it did start to move did so from north to south. one would expect the noise to drop off quickly when leaving but it did not do that,  is seemed to be emitting noise from all directions.  after 3 mins it disapated, while moving south,  the noise dispeared because of distance and not direction of "engines" which is what would be expected if it was an aircraft of some kind.  i am not sure if anyone else heard this,  although the noise was very very loud it did not rattle any widows or doors, which is strange.  i have never reported on this type thing before. i am hoping that perhaps this group knows what it could have been or have had other reportings of this in this area.  if i ever hear this again i will try to record it. thank you.
content.summary: Very loud noise,  did not have a usally doppler like effect with other known objects that fly.  last about 3 mins and seemed strange with a soft glow and cloudy.

content.detailedDescription: On february 1st 2003 i was at work and stepped outside just before daybreak to smoke a cigarette. it was still dark outside when i noticed a huge orange ball of fire tumbling slowly gliding overhead travelling in a north easterly direction. it was very large and absolutely silent as it drifted toward earth and although i could not observe its trajectory, i knew it was falling and would probably hit the earth within 20 to 40 miles from where i was standing. at one point i tried to measure it by holding my arms open and positioning my left and right hands as if i were holding the object. my hands were approximatyely 18 inches apart, it was big. as it neared the tree line, i ran back into the building and alerted one of my co-workes to take a look at this unusual phenomenon. it must have taken her a few minutes to gather her things because when she and i exited the building, day had broke, the fire ball had vanished leaving no visible evidence that it had ever existed, no trail of smoke, nothing. a co-worker who happened to be driving to work at the time stated that she had seen a glowing orb falling from the sky at approximately 120 degree angle. she concurred that it was travelling rather slow but claimed that it did not appear that large (which meant that the fire ball must have been closer to where i was). she was travelling from vacaville to the sonoma developmental center, eldridge california and i  was at sdc at the time i observed the ball of fire. later that day i learned of the space shuttle columbia's disintigration shortly after it reentered the earths atmosphere. when i told friends what i had seen they suggested that perhaps i had seen parts of the space shuttle columbia. i am quite certain that what i saw was not peices of burning debria from the columbia because what i saw was bigger than the space shuttle itself and...I learned that the columbia did not begin to fall apart until it was somewhere above nevada. i saw a film clip of the columbia disintigrating above texas, it was still relatively high in the sky and you could discern the shape ofthe craft, what i saw was engulfed in flames, it was round and did not appear to resemble the shape of a space shuttle. i know of only one other person who saw a tumbling ball of fire that morning. if you know anythingabou this i would appreciate it if you could pass that along to me
content.summary: Huge tumbling ball of fire falling silently

content.detailedDescription: My roommate and i were outside on the porch having a cigarette when i noticed in the distance a red and white light going from left to right through a tree that was blocking my visual path. it then stopped and moved right to left, pulsating red and white. there was no pattern to the lights in any way. it seemed as if it were rotating. i quickly grabbed my binoculars while my roommate watched it. it continued going back and forth on the horizon while lowering elevation. it then started moving closer to our location. we then decided to get in our car and get closer to the object. we ended up a town over and more closer then we expected. it was still moving back and forth and circling. it was maybe 20 ft above the tree line then just circled around and changed course. one big figure eight pattern. then left and right. i told my roommate it added light-blue lights to it's pattern as it was circling he responded with, "i can only see red and white. no blue at all". it was so close not to see the colors. it then went behind another tree line were we lost track of it. we followed it in the direction it seemed to head but it just vanished. no sign of it after it headed south. i called my friend up and she had told me some of her friends in our area had witnessed the same craft at the same time. i've seen u.F.O's before but this time i never expected to get so close to it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright white and red lights travelling in a non-conventional way.

content.detailedDescription: I was having a cigarette on my porch with my roommate watching lightning in the far distance to the east. i noticed an orange light in the distance getting brighter and brighter. i pointed it out to my roommate. it then got dimmer then completely disappeared. about 10 seconds later, it brightened up again but got brighter and brighter and in the exact same spot. it then appeared to start shaking violently. after about 3 seconds of shaking, it then shot straight up faster than anything i have ever seen go through the sky. it left an orange trail behind it that only stayed for about a half second. it then disappeared through the clouds and never returned. i sat for about another 15 minutes hoping it would show up but it never did.
content.summary: Hovered, disappeared, reappeared, then shot straight up at an incredible speed

content.detailedDescription: While setting off fireworks and watching the city fireworks (on the 4th of july) from my parents house my mom, brother, wife, sister, and i saw three separate red/orange/white orbs in the sky.  this was shortly after the city fireworks display.  the objects were changing colors and moved slowly.  at first they appeared to be at a low altitude(slightly above the maximum height of the professional fireworks),and then gained altitude.  two objects were side by side while the third object was at a greater distance the lower right.  i followed the two and went to look at the third while the other two objects just vanished.   the third object then disappeared as well within a few seconds of the others.  since we were filming the fireworks i was able to get video of the 3rd object once i realized the objects did not appear to be a plane/helecopter/firework/balloon.  i looked up on the internet today after going through our vacation pictures and wondered if anyone else saw the objects.  i noticed on the site that someone else did as well so i thought i would report it as well.
content.summary: 3 orbs in the sky that just "went out"

content.detailedDescription:
Standing in my doorway at home waiting for food to cook, went outside to look at the sky (i dont know what made me do it). after surveying the sky, i noticed that this light was just barely changing and moving at the same time. to make sure it was moving, i sat down, and lined it up with the trees, and sure enough this thing was dipping down and dissapearing behind the trees, then shooting right back up. i first though it was a star, but our stars don't move like that. this object wasa small ball/star like orb changing colors from a cold blue color, to a warm strongish color. this thing flew around like a bug or something, small, unpredictable motions, as if it were its own life form.   


this is the second time i have taken the time to look up at the sky and noticed something strange like this. it leaves me in awe. 

object dissapeared behind tree line, haven't seen it since.
content.summary: Small starlike object dancing around like a fly, about as small as stars in the little dipper. changed color blue/white to yellow/orange while dancing around. watched for 10 minutes until it floated behind treeline.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the parking lot of the very quiet and secluded community i lived in. it was a little after 1:00am, and i had just returned home from my job where i had the late shift. i looked up at the sky, on my way towards my apartment front door, and directly above me was a huge boomerang shaped craft gliding silently from a northern direction and headed in a southern direction.  it was completely silent, and it almost entirely blocked out the sky from my view as it flew over my head. the body of the craft was very dark and smooth in appearance, it looked almost black, and there were five large circular lights in total, on the underside of the craft.
there was two lights on each wing of the boomerang and one at the head of the boomerang. these lights were very large perfect circles which were white in color and they did not give off any glare or reflective light.  they looked like they were fairly deep circular recesses in the craft and the light seemed to be almost gaseous because the light seemed to ripple though it did not waver in intensity.  i was dumbfounded on how it could be so huge and make no noise. it was at a very low altitude, approximately 10 stories high, would be my best quess. it flew over my head and i could see it completely clearly in detail, and it proceeded to fly over the two story apartment building that was about 30 feet in front of me.
it then changed direction easily and turned left and proceeded to fly over the very dark golf course which was directly behind the apartment building.
i watched it until it flew beyond my range of sight. i told a co-worker about it the next day, and he told me about the phoenix lights sightings which i had not heard about before. i researched it and recognized that what i had seen was the same exact type of craft as the v shaped craft seen over arizona, and it had very similiar characteristics. since then, 
i have also read online about how a tourist fairly recently videotaped the same exact type of v shaped craft with five white lights on its underside, right over las vegas near the treasure island hotel. that hotel is very close to where i had my sighting in 2000. perhaps the craft is alien in origin, or perhaps it is a covert air force craft.
content.summary: Summer 2000, large v shaped craft at low altitude, night sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in backyard with a friend around 9pm when an orange light appeared over mountains to east. it then turned into a line of three lights and then suddenly disappeared. the lights also showed up a couple more times briefly for around a min before going away completely.
content.summary: Saw orange lights appear. first just one but then it formed a line of 3 seperate lights.

content.detailedDescription:
We were northbound on a hemet street.  we were on a routine volunteer patrol for hemet pd.
two contrails
part of a contrail.
the two objects were hovering.
we wondered what they were.
we turned on a cross street.
content.summary: My patrol partner and i noticed these.   the objects did not move, dissipate, or disappear.  the contrails dissipated.  the two objects remained in a hover.
Driving down road saw cars pulled over i loked up and saw what they did.2 arrow shaped enormous ufos

content.detailedDescription: On the 5th of july ajsfkadfjlkdsjfjflksjlkflksjjlkdsfjlkdsf
content.summary: This is a test case #101

content.detailedDescription: On july 4th, 2012, i'm guessing it was after 9pm, certainly after the diamondbacks game, from my backyard my wife and i noticed a fiery orange orb heading north, east of 7th street and bell rd. in phoenix.  i assumed that it was a firework for independence day.  however, it was too large and traveled at a steady rate for too long.  at one point, once it had past bell rd. it shifted direction and appeared to be heading toward us.  my wife felt uncomfortable and headed indoors stating "it's coming toward us!"  i remained watching for a few more seconds as it approached, then it shifted suddenly at a rapid rate and shot off toward the northwest valley.  after a few more seconds, i could no longer see it. shared the story with others, but was unconvinced of what i saw until i noticed others had seen the same orange orb.
content.summary: Fiery orange orb moving north, shifting east, then shifting northwest at rapid rate then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I believe i witnessed a ufo this afternoon on my way home from work. this occurred about 20-30 miles east of springfield in southwest missouri. i was driving in a southeast direction on highway 125 near sparta, mo towards oldfield, and saw an oval-shaped brilliantly colored white to silver object towards the north. it was far away so i cannot judge the distance, but what struck me was its rapid speed and unusual movement. the object went from right to left very fast, but then began to turn back in a clockwise fashion so rapidly that i knew it could not be an airplane. then it just disappeared. i thought i saw a second identical object near the first one but my view became obscured by trees and i had no place to pull over for a better look. it was definitely something i will never forget.
content.summary: Oval shaped, silver colored shaped ufo zipped around clockwise very rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
June 19th 2012 on my way to work about 5 am i stopped in the duluth minn. ship canal to take some pictures of a beautiful sunrise just coming up over lake superior. i noted a light in the sky to the north east about 20 degrees up and approximately 3-5 miles away which i passed off as sun reflection or something ... not really paying notice to it.
i got to work and discussed the sunrise with another work mate and he mentioned "did you see that weird light" i stated yes what was it? we then reviewed the pics and agreed it was unusual. the object we saw was glowing gold like the sunrise and did not move or moved very little but was under the cloud cover so as not to be a satellite or star and i have noted that the moon is in the se at this time in morning.I took my pics for about 10 minutes and left for work, the object was there when i left. after viewing the photos and enlarging them i thought i should notify mufon.
i have lived on lake superior all my life have watched hundreds of sunrises and have never seen anything like that before. i was in the military and was a trained observer, i know this was no conventional aircraft and have checked the scene several times since and have seen nothing in that area of the sky such as stars,satellites or planets. nothing visible in the sky at all at that time of morning except the sunrise.
i may add that the area had been having heavy storms for a few days and the area of duluth mn. neighboring superior wi. and nearby areas were severely flooded the following day
could you please contact me and let me know what you folks think?
content.summary: Taking pic of sunrise cauht object in frames. several  pictures over several minutes

content.detailedDescription:
2012-07-13 at 2114 hour tehran +4:30 gmt  i was wandering near near  the farhazad province in the northern west o tehran. when i looked upward in the direction o perseus  constellation a orangish light drew my attention. it was stationed in the sky without making any noise. orange light after a while started to move upward.
the ascending continued for a about 1 minute before the object stop again. at this moment the orange light moved  eastward and covering the distance between ursa major and ursa minor constellations.
after moving eastward or to the right side of my fov the object suddenly stopped up and hide behind trees  that were so high that could cover that part of sky.
orange light in this while started to blink and the luminosity started to decrease. at this moment i had to say hello to some of my friend and family member so i could not watch the sky. when i wanted to watch it again the object was gone and in spite of the way that i stood under the sky for half an hour i tried to found it again i did not see anything else.
i'm an astronomy  teacher and it is about 15 years that my life is filled with celestial and astronomical events. i can completely distinguish a ufo from a star or meteor and of course a plane or satellite.  
this was not like anything that i've ever seen before���
content.summary: Ascending pultating light

content.detailedDescription: I drive for a freight company out of salt lake city,at approximately 9:37pm on july 10th 2012 while driving west towards nevada, i first witnessed an amber light in the shape of an upsidedown light bulb going in and out of a cloud which was about 1/4 mile away. i watched this light for about 2 minutes before noticing the next object. about 3 miles west of there i witnessed in the distance 3 moving objects flying from south to north in a stright pattern flying approximately 25 miles per hour, it was a weird experience after that! i kept seeing flashes of light around the hillside but away from the objects that i'd just seen. the flashes of light are hard to discribe, to me it looked like something out of a syfy movie... i had to pull over at a rest stop to witness these weird sightings. the lights that i was seeing were... i really don't know how else to discribe this... it was like balls of light exploding on the ground and spreading outward about a quarter mile in diameter! i watched this for about 7 minutes. in that 7 minute timeframe i watched this happen 2 different times and the balls of light fell on 2 different locations but, you didn't see the lights fall from the sky to the ground... it was like the light came from underground and all you saw was the light spreading outward with contact to the surface! the scary part for me was watching this unfold so close to a chemical plant!!! after waiting about another 5 minutes and seeing nothing happening i continued on my trip to nevada. approximately 6 hours later on my way back to salt lake city, utah i witnessed and recorded on my phone military vehicles leaving the area where i had seen those light anomalies happening the previous night! just thought it was alot of weird happenings all in a very short time! and thought even if its explainable, i t needed to be reported!
content.summary: Triangular in shape with a blue strobe light

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the terrace of the building i live in downtown santiago 22nd floor, then i saw this light similar to a star but much brighter than a star and a satellite too, it did just one straight path (this path was similar to a plane going from the intl airport of santiago, arturo merino benitez to a small airfiled called eulogio sanchez tobalaba but never landed). first i thought it was descending, but then the object reduced it���s speed and stopped descending and began a horizontal path at approx. 2,000 feet. i saw it during 3 or 4 minutes at 19:10, it was dark at the time, no clouds. the object emitted no lights of any kind and no sound either, at the moment i could saw a few comercial planes in the area, much brighter (with their corresponding strobe lights) and much noisier too and one helicopter, i could easily identify them however not this weird light. in bottomline i have seen before during my life (i am 31 years old) space junk falling from the skies, little meteors and this was definitely none of them and i was a private pilot too, and i have never seen sometihng like this before. i tried to film it, however my cell phone wasn���t able to film anything, too dark for my cell phone i think, and the object i am not sure if it dissapeared behind a cloud (even if i didn���t saw any cloud) or behind the smog of the city, or some weird fog or mist, not sure really, maybe it just became invisible. difficult to say. i called inmediately the www.Dgac.Cl, similar to the faa in the u.S., at 19:19, however a guard of the entity answered me and said that at that time everybody finished their work it he was all by himself and didn���t helped me at all. thank you very much.
greetings.
francisco sandoval.
santiago, chile.
content.summary: No strobe lights, no sound, no star, no satellite, straight line star like light, then dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
11pm

my daughter and i went outside to look at the night sky. we watched a satellite-like light quickly zip past arcturus. it flared up brilliantly as if it had exploded. a few seconds later it reappeared further along its same trajectory and zipped northward until it faded. 

as we were watched the first light fade, in my peripheral vision near cygnus, i saw what looked like a quick falling star. i pointed out the area of the sky to my daughter and as we stared at the area another short burst (line) of light appeared and then flared up as if it had exploded. it disappeared, reappeared a couple of seconds later, flared up and disappeared again. it did this a few times (continuing on in a straight line) until if faded off into into the horizon. 

i don't know what these lights were. i would guess people would say they were meteors skimming along the atmosphere or that they were spinning and glinting satellites, but i have never seen a meteor fall in such a manner nor have i ever beheld a satellite behave in such manner either. as far as i am concerned they were truly unidentified flying objects. 

i thought the lights were quite amazing but my daughter felt frightened and anxious by the sight of them.
content.summary: "exploding" satellite-like lights

content.detailedDescription: I had just parked my car in the parking lot of the apartment complex where i lived.  when i got out of the car, i looked up at the clear night sky and saw 8 red orbs flying from the general direction of the east towards the west.  they were all moving at the same speed in the same direction, in a scattered formation. they were moving quickly at the approximate altitude of a commercial plane. i am very familiar with seeing commercial planes, helicopters, and known military aircraft and these red orbs were unlike any known aircraft i had seen. the red orbs light did not pulsate or waver, and though the red light was bright, it did not give off any glare. two of the orbs then effortlessly reversed and changed direction and manuevered next to another one of the orbs to form a perfect triangle flight formation with the third orb. the rest of the orbs stayed on the same flight path they were already on and did not create any other triangle formations. i watched them for approximately 2 minutes until they flew out of visual range.
content.summary: 8 red orbs over san fernando valley, april 1990, night sighting

content.detailedDescription:
1. when i was about 9 or 10 i lived in a house that was on a golf course named arroyo del oso. my brothers and i played on it all the time. one starry night i was out on the course playing around.

2. i looked up at the stars and the teardrop object was significantly larger than the stars and obviously in the atmospher.

3. i was very young and only found it to be strange. i didn't think of it as a ufo until years later 
but i was fascinated by it and couldn't take my eyes off it.

4. large bright blue teardrop shaped object. it hovered motionless in the sky for a minute or two and then in an instant it moved from being above me to being right above the sandia crest and then disappeared.

5. a feeling of curiosity  and confusion.

6. instantly disappeared
content.summary: At night i saw a blue teardrop shap craft in the sky then it disappeared to the mountains

content.detailedDescription: Just before dark on july 10 2012 ihad been out watering the garden.I came inside and sat down in my chair .From my chair i look out over the lake and can see for miles.I had been only sitting for maybe a minute when two bright lites caught my eye out the side window.I looked at them for a couple of secounds before i relized what i was seeing.The two objects were as bright as the sun,one was like a blob of lite,like a small sun.The other was cigar shaped with round circles running the link of it.I jumped out my chair and startled my wife who was washing the dishes.I headed for my deck to get a better look.I bent down so i could keep my eye on them as igot to the deck i stuck my head out the door and  for about a split second they just were there and then they were gone.I dont know what i saw,but what ever it was i wasnt the only one who had a sighting that nite.There were many reports of something in the sky that nite,my sighting was before dark,just at dusk.Our local paper reported many reports of 911 calls that came in.Thats makes me feel a little better,im not just seeing things.
content.summary: Two large bright as the sun objects were hovering for about 15 seconds ,gone in blink of an eye

content.detailedDescription:
In april 2005,
approximately 6pm, i was traveling on the highway heading from arizona into nevada heading up towards boulder/las vegas, nevada.  at dusk time, i decided before going into town and through the long line of cars heading up to boulder dam area, that i would camp one last night along the road and so i pulled off the main highway heading north and onto a service dirt road along the main highway and headed into the vicinity somewhere south of lake las vegas.
since i was alone i had no intention to venture into boulder/vegas that night and find a hotel.  instead i ended up in the middle of this marshy dry desert creek bed in my ford explorer and decided i was far enough away from the main highway to park and fall asleep for the evening.   as the nighttime darkness came around i could see the lights and flight path of the jet airliners flying from the west of me in the horizon, probably leaving mccarran airport and trailing off towards the east.  i was facing south east outside of my truck watching the night sky and noticing all the air traffic, blinking lights and shimmering stars.  it was a seeming clear night. again, as i was looking in a southerly direction i noticed this star-like light getting brighter and brighter and pulsating orange, reddish and white, as it was headed towards me descending from the south mountains, this star like light was coming in from nowhere, i can see that it was entering from space.  now, in contrast to the jet flight path, this light was very peculiar to me as i watched it get brighter and larger and at first it looked like a star but after about 10 minutes i could tell this light was entering the atmosphere and headed down towards my area of the desert.   watching about 20 minutes, i then noticed that this light broke off into two other lights and they came down towards me in a triangle formation but still high in the sky.  what i saw were now, three lights in a perfect triangle formation way above the jet airliner trail path in the distance and rotating in on my vantage point.  then i could see that another star like pulsating light (just like the first one) coming down the same way as the first and it also broke off into 3 lights flying in the same triangle formation, now six lights heading down toward me in a rotating manner.  
i watched this for about 20 more minutes and it seemed to me as if these two triangle formations were comprised as of 6 total lights.  i watched this for a while as these lights were changing colors and rotated and came closer down towards my truck. i was fascinated watching this distinctively and succinctly from just outside of my suv.
i don���t know how long i watched this for but these lights kind of danced in on me as if they were examining my camp from way up above.  i can���t recall how low they came into me but it was clear in my mind that these lights knew i was watching them maneuver in the night sky. it must have been for a while, maybe over an hour because the weather surprisingly started to get drizzly and a little rainy during this event.  even though i could feel rain on my face and my clothes were getting wet i stayed watching these fascinating lights.  they seemed strangely friendly to me and i was not at all scared, just fascinated.  

now, i don���t remember falling asleep after that spectacle but i woke up in the driver���s seat of my white ford explorer with my hands gripping on the front steering wheel. and, after i woke up early that morning (approx. 5am), i did feel a little awestruck and i after checking myself, my wallet and my keys, i began to start the suv and drove thru some mud back onto the main highway shoulder and proceeded to drive up north west to lake mead, boulder dam area.

this is the truth to the best of my knowledge and i attest that i was not under any influence of neither alcohol nor any neither illegal nor prescription drugs at the time nor during any of my short camping adventures across the desert.

marcus von
content.summary: two pulsing starlike objects decending towards me breaking up into two other lights in triangle formation.

content.detailedDescription: While walking home from the neighbors, i saw a huge object flying overhead blocking view of stars with no sound, it passed by more than 10 times faster than any airplane, plus the size was enormous.  there was no sound, and it was black, i could not see any shape either.  if i had not been looking at the bright stars i would of never known it passed by.
content.summary: While walking home from the neighbors, i saw a huge object flying overhead (blocking view of stars) with no sound.
